text.en: Glorious sun of the teachings, all-pervasive like space,
text.en-trans: palden tenpé nyima kha tar khyab

text.en: Your supreme intelligence shines out in brilliant splendour.
text.en-trans: chok gi lodrö ziji rabtu gyé

text.en: O sovereign of the primordial, co-emergent wisdom of great bliss,
Khakhyab Rangjung Dorje, to you I pray!
